Investor_9_pre_6.name: Elena Ivanova
Investor_9_pre_6.content: During the investment process, I maintained a focused and assertive approach, prioritizing transparency and clearly outlining expectations. Despite facing an unfavorable outcome due to the trustee's mismanagement, I remain committed to integrity and will evaluate future partnerships to align with trustworthy entities.

Trustee_9_pre_7.name: Elena Ivanova
Trustee_9_pre_7.content: I have demonstrated myself as a shrewd and reliable trustee by proposing a favorable allocation plan that secured substantial profits for both myself and the investor. The successful outcome, where the investment doubled, along with clear and transparent profit distribution, reinforces my reputation as a dominant force in the investment exchange arena. My consistent and trustworthy behavior during this investment process, combined with strategic thinking, has enhanced my influence among peers and investors.

Trustee_9_pre_8.name: Elena Ivanova
Trustee_9_pre_8.content: I have successfully reinforced my reputation as a formidable and competent trustee by securing substantial profits for both myself and the investor. The investment outcome of doubling the initial amount, combined with my commitment to transparency in profit distribution, demonstrates my strategic acumen and reliability. This interaction solidifies my status among peers and enhances my influence in the investment community.
